name: Cemetery Background
description:
## Cemetery Background

A limited edition Halloween event! Looks like a Bumpkin Bimbo summoned the necromancer again...

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
